title: How About a Middle Ground?
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, hey, Zuramaru-chan. When Ai says autumn, you say~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Reading!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeh, it’s sports! It’s the best season to move around because the weather is so much cooler!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Then it’s the same for reading zura. The cooler weather makes autumn the best season to read!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Good weather is good for anything, huh? Then, how about reading while running? It’s twice the fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Reading while running....? Are you out of your mind zura, Ai-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, that’s a no go, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Why don’t we just take the middle ground and say that it’s the best season to eat?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oooh! The middle ground (Aida), eh? Perfect for Ai (Ai da)~!! Ai totally agrees that it’s best for eating. Ai wants to bake some potatoes~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Me too! Then, let’s go buy some big potatoes zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
